Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
1/3 2:43PM - With fresh flakes flying, Saturdays been fun out there, and were lining up for another great day tomorrow. For your Sunday, we are planning on having 68 ways down, 66 of which are scheduled for some quality time with the groomers overnight. 11 lifts are set to spin at 8:30AM with the possibility of delays due to high winds. Early access will be available for First Tracks and Ikon pass holders tomorrow. Temperatures will remain cold so be sure to pack the extra layer and keep your face covered. Theres still plenty of fun to be had this weekend with our second Ikon pass stoke event and all the activities to keep the energy rolling all weekend. Rest those legs and let's do it all over again tomorrow. Catch ya bright and early!

The park scene is coming to life with a 13-foot Halfpipe open and firing on East Byrnes Side with 6 features to keep the laps rolling. Tyrolinne is also open with 7 features ready to ride.

Colder temperatures sticking around have allowed snowmaking and resurfacing operations to go underway and will continue over the next several days as our team works around the clock to get Stratton looking and riding its best.

Safety Tip: The skier or rider in front of you have the right of way.

Holiday week is in full swing with extended dining hours, live music, and special events keeping the Village looking lively. Check out our Holiday Week Dining, Aprs & Live Music Guide to see what's open, happening, and where the music is at. Theres something for everyone this Holiday week and we couldnt be more excited to celebrate with you! Click here to check out the upcoming Events Calendar.

The Coca-Cola Tube Park is open! Reservations are recommended to save your spot while availability lasts. Tubing is available in 50 minute sessions starting at the top of each hour. Book now to secure your tickets! Please read the details and policies prior to purchasing your tickets. Hope to see you there!

Ice Skating is open! Lace up and head to the Mill House skating pond for a day or night of winter fun. Enjoy music and a campfire all while gliding under the stars. Book now to guarantee your place on the ice.

Guided Snowmobile Tours are up and running! Explore Stratton after hours with friends and family on a tour to the summit. Be sure to book your spot now to guarantee your spot.

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability.
